lexUnit.name: instrumental.a

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: important or serving as a principle means in some undertaking.

sentence.text: Mr Finlay also regards the standard of local primary education instrumental in the success of Glenlola .

Purposive-rational or instrumental action is governed by technical rules based on empirical knowledge that implies conditional predictions about observable events , physical or social .
